mapper.select: SELECT menu.id id, menu.parent_id parentId, menu.title title, menu.url url, menu.`type` `type`, menu.`name` `name`, menu.icon icon, menu.hidden hidden, menu.sort sort FROM sys_role_admin ra LEFT JOIN sys_role role ON role.id = ra.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON role.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu menu ON menu.id = rm.menu_id WHERE ra.admin_id = #{adminId} AND menu.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY menu.id ORDER BY menu.sort ASC
